newsitem.title: USA: Philip Morris sets $650 mln in notes.
newsitem.headline: Philip Morris sets $650 mln in notes.

text.p: The following debt issue was priced on Thursday, according to lead manager Morgan Stanley & Co Inc.
TYPE NOTES ISS PRICE 99.67 PAY DATE 03/15/97
LAST MOODY A2 SPREAD 67 BP PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LAST S&P SINGLE-A YIELD 7.33 PCT CALLABLE NO
UNDERLYING: WHEN-ISSUED FIVE-YEAR U.S. TREASURY NOTE
